title: I didn't receive my riot points
body:
Hello everyone,

I just bought Riot Points for a total of 35,00 Euros. Unfortunately i did not receive my Riot Points in the game itself. What do I have to do now?

Dylan

PS: The money is already gone from my bank account, just saying haha :(

replies.body:
Hello! 

Are you still having issues with your RP purchase? If the RP hasn't been credited to your account, please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a look at your purchase history and make the necessary adjustments. ^-^
